description: Hajime`s Meowstic used to accompany the family to picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Ryuji wanted to prove that he could of use to his brother and father and vowed to his older brother Hajime that he`d become a stronger Pok√©mon Trainer than him. Hajime`s Meowstic rescued Bonnie from a Spear and then teamed up to battle their father`s Bakuong.
name: Nyaonix (Hajime)
